body.p: The Main tab contains general information about the lemma entry.
Choose or change the name of the lemma.
Choose a type and subtype (e.g. substantive, adjective etc.).
Rearrange the items in the Lemma Navigator tree (the default order is alphabetical).
See the ID of the lemma.
See and edit the author of a lemma.
See the date of creation of the lemma.
Change who can see the lemma (public, project, group, user).
Enter or edit the Review state of the lemma (published, reviewed, awaiting-update, awaiting-review, new etc.).
move the lemma to another project.
See or edit the name of the corpus. Click to move an object/lemma between projects/databases.
See all changes done in this database-object with User Name and Date.
